sentences.en: Above on the hillside was a large, gaunt, grey house.
sentences.cn: 山坡上有幢难看的灰色大房子。

sentences.en: Athene's horse stood grim and gaunt and motionless beside the temple wall.
sentences.cn: 阿西妮的马凶恶地、吓人地、一动不动地立在庙墙旁边.

sentences.en: Chu clutched Bethune's hand, his gaunt face covered with emotion.
sentences.cn: 徐紧紧抓住白求恩的手, 瘦瘦的脸上充满了感情.

sentences.en: He had gaunt cheeks after his long illness.
He was concentrating, his face strained and gaunt, as it had been for months.
sentences.cn: 他全神贯注, 面容憔悴, 这已有好几个月了.

sentences.en: His dry pallid face often looked gaunt.
sentences.cn: 他那张干瘪苍白的脸常常显得憔悴.

sentences.en: His gaunt face seemed paler than before.
sentences.cn: 他那憔悴的脸似乎显得比以前更苍白了.

sentences.en: I cannot read what I have written with this gaunt hand.
sentences.cn: 我无法读我这只瘦骨嶙峋的手写下的文字.

sentences.en: Looking gaunt and tired, he denied there was anything to worry about.
sentences.cn: 他看起来消瘦而疲惫，却说没什么可担心的。

sentences.en: She does not eat, she never mentions Louis, and she looks gaunt and haunted.
sentences.cn: 她不吃东西, 始终不提路易斯, 人显得瘦削憔悴,若有所思.

sentences.en: The eyes of the gaunt spectre darkened again, as they had in his youth.
sentences.cn: 于是这瘦鬼的两眼又黯然出神, 就同他年青时代的眼睛一样.

sentences.en: The gaunt man said gloomily, " It's always all right; that's our trouble. "
sentences.cn: 瘦男人消沉地说: “ 每回都很顺利, 这 就是 我们的麻烦. ”

sentences.en: The old house stood gaunt and empty, a complete ruin.
sentences.cn: 那栋旧房子荒凉空洞地伫立着, 像一堆废墟.

sentences.en: The old man was thin and gaunt with deep wrinkles in the back of his neck.
sentences.cn: 老人消瘦而憔悴,脖颈上有些很深的皱纹.

sentences.en: The strong and darkly handsome visage was gaunt and haggard.
sentences.cn: 那张孔武黝黑的英俊面孔相当的疲惫憔悴.

trans.tran_cn: 憔悴的，骨瘦如柴的，荒凉的
trans.tran_en: very thin and pale, especially because of illness or continued worry
